tasks.label: PainterEngine Debug
tasks.command:
cd %PainterEnginePath%\platform\windows
cd $env:PainterEnginePath\platform\windows
make clean -f makefile_vscdebug -e project_path=\"${workspaceFolder}\"
make -f makefile_vscdebug -e project_path=\"${workspaceFolder}\"

tasks.label: PainterEngine Release
tasks.command:
cd %PainterEnginePath%\platform\windows
cd $env:PainterEnginePath\platform\windows
make clean -f makefile_vscrelease -e project_path=\"${workspaceFolder}\"
make -f makefile_vscrelease -e project_path=\"${workspaceFolder}\"

tasks.label: PainterEngine Clean
